title: Exploring Nomenclature Changes and Identity in Educational Technology for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology (exposure to terminology/concepts)
context.additional_context: Learners aim to explore careers in educational technology, with a focus on expanding practical insights through asynchronous discussions and case analyses.

learning_goals: The historical evolution of terminology in educational technology can be explained in connection with contextual shifts across eras
The academic values and identity reflected in naming components (word order/grouping) can be analyzed
The impact of naming decisions on organizational identity can be evaluated through case studies of actual programs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
